name: Banana Pancakes
ingredients:
1 cup all-purpose flour
1 tbsp. White sugar
2 tbsp. Baking Powder
1/4 tbsp. Salt
1 egg, beaten
steps:
1. Add flour, milk, baking powder, and vegetable oil to the eggs and mix to make a batter.
2. Stir mashed bananas into the batter.
3. Ladle batter in 1/4 cup portions onto hot griddle.
4. Cook until tiny air bubbles form on top, 2 to 5 minutes; turn and continue cooking until the bottoms are browned, 2 to 3 minutes.
